uiTabs:
window.addEventListener('resize', test);function test(){var tabs=document.getElementsByClassName('uiTab');for(var i=0;i<tabs.length;i++){if (tabs[i].offsetWidth>tabs[i].parentElement.offsetWidth/2){tabs[i].classList.add('edge');}else if (tabs[i].offsetWidth<tabs[i].parentElement.offsetWidth/2.5){tabs[i].classList.remove('edge');}}}
function openA(){hamb=document.getElementById('onglet');if(hamb.style.width=='40px'){hamb.style.width='250px';objec=hamb.querySelectorAll('.tabItem');for(var i=0;i<objec.length;i++){objec[i].style.left='0';}}else{hamb.style.width='40px';objec=hamb.querySelectorAll('.tabItem');for(var i=0;i<objec.length;i++){objec[i].style.left='-250px';}}}
